content.title: Uses
content.description: Leaves are used as greens. Rich in vitamins A, B,C,D,E and K. Minerals like Calcium, Copper, Iron, Potassium, Magnesium, Manganese and Zinc are present. Has more than 40 anti-oxidants. Fruit used to make curry and fry. The leaves, pods, seeds, gums, bark and flowers are used to relieve mineral and vitamin deficiencies. It supports a healthy cardiovascular system, promote normal blood-glucose levels, neutralize free radicals, enrich anaemic blood and support immune system. It is utilized as fertilizer and fodder for livestock.
